name: Fluttershy's YouTube(YayTube) Design [WIP]
description:
A bit stylized Youtube Design for Fluttershy from My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic. It uses green, pink and yellow colors mostly.

Redesigned player works only with HTML5 player. Because it's (probably) impossible to redesign flash player using only stylish.

Also be sure to check out redesigned YouTube logo only: http://userstyles.org/styles/94235/fluttershy-s-youtube-yaytube-logo deviantART post: http://fav.me/d734yz0
additional_info:
<mark>Update 04.06.2014</mark> Finally wrote player button positions into CSS, no more re-uploading image with buttons on it.
Next step, probably, making this CSS as a template for customizing YouTube. At least for the rest of Mane6.
